Class BibItem

java.lang.Object
packagebibtex.BibItem
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<BibItem>
public class BibItem
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<BibItem>

    appends suffix of Technical Report Bibliographic Item to the common BibTeX prefix, and sets the value of Technical Report BibItem's BibTex Format to the same.

  • Constructor Details

    • BibItem

      public BibItem​(java.lang.String authorName, int yearPublished, java.lang.String title)
      Constructor for creation of default BibItem using Common Attributes of each type.
      Parameters:
      authorName - contains name of the author of the BibItem.
      yearPublished - contains year of publication of the BibItem.
      title - contains title of the BibItem

    • BibItem

      public BibItem​(java.lang.String authorName, int yearPublished, java.lang.String title, java.lang.String publisherName)
      Overloaded Constructor for creation of Book-Specific BibItem using Common Attributes, as well as Book-Specific attributes.
      Parameters:
      authorName - contains name of the author of the Book.
      yearPublished - contains year of publication of the Book.
      title - contains title of the Book.
      publisherName - contains name of publisher of the Book.

    • BibItem

      public BibItem​(java.lang.String authorName, int yearPublished, java.lang.String title, java.lang.String journalName, java.lang.String DOILink)
      Overloaded Constructor for creation of Article-Specific BibItem using Common Attributes, as well as Article-Specific attributes.
      Parameters:
      authorName - contains name of the author of the Article.
      yearPublished - contains year of publication of the Article.
      title - contains title of the Article.
      journalName - contains name of the Journal of the Article
      DOILink - contains DOI Link for the Article.

    • BibItem

      public BibItem​(java.lang.String authorName, int yearPublished, java.lang.String title, java.lang.String institutionName, int datePublished)
      Overloaded Constructor for creation of TechReport-Specific BibItem using Common Attributes, as well as TechReport-Specific attributes.
      Parameters:
      authorName - contains name of the author of the Technical Report.
      yearPublished - contains year of publication of the Technical Report.
      title - contains title of the Technical Report.
      institutionName - contains name of the institution where Technical Report was created.
      datePublished - contains date when the Technical Report was submitted.

  • Method Details

    • setBasicInputs

      public void setBasicInputs​(java.lang.String authorName, int yearPublished, java.lang.String title)
      sets Common Attributes of each type of BibItem to the values provided.
      Parameters:
      authorName - contains name of the author of the BibItem.
      yearPublished - contains year of publication of the BibItem.
      title - contains title of the BibItem.

    • constructBasicBibTexFormat

      public java.lang.String constructBasicBibTexFormat​(java.lang.String type, java.lang.String citeKey, java.lang.String authorName, int yearPublished, java.lang.String title)
      constructs the common prefix of BibTex Format for each type of Bibliographic Item
      Parameters:
      type - contains the type of BibItem, can be either "book", "article" or "techreport".
      citeKey - contains the citation key of the BibItem.
      authorName - contains the name of the author of the BibItem.
      yearPublished - contains the year published of the BibItem.
      title - contains the title of the BibItem.
      Returns:
      String returns the String containing common Prefix of BibTeX-Style format for each type.

    • constructBasicHarvardFormat

      public java.lang.String constructBasicHarvardFormat​(java.lang.String authorName, int yearPublished, java.lang.String title)
      constructs the common prefix of Harvard Format for each type of Bibliographic Item, and returns the same.
      Parameters:
      authorName - contains the name of the author of the BibItem.
      yearPublished - contains the year published of the BibItem.
      title - contains the title of the BibItem.
      Returns:
      String returns the String containing common Prefix of Harvard - Style format for each type.

    • constructHarvardFormat

      public void constructHarvardFormat​(java.lang.String publisherName)
      appends suffix of Book Bibliographic Item to the common Harvard prefix, and sets the value of Book BibItem's Harvard Format to the same.
      Parameters:
      publisherName - contains name of the publisher of the book.

    • constructHarvardFormat

      public void constructHarvardFormat​(java.lang.String journalName, java.lang.String DOILink)
      appends suffix of Article Bibliographic Item to the common Harvard prefix, and sets the value of Article BibItem's Harvard Format to the same.
      Parameters:
      journalName - contains name of the journal of article.
      DOILink - contains the DOI Link of the article.

    • constructHarvardFormat

      public void constructHarvardFormat​(java.lang.String institutionName, int datePublished)
      appends suffix of Technical Report Bibliographic Item to the common Harvard prefix, and sets the value of Technical Report BibItem's Harvard Format to the same.
      Parameters:
      institutionName - contains name of institution where technical report was created.
      datePublished - contains date of submission of technical report.

    • constructBibTexFormat

      public void constructBibTexFormat​(java.lang.String publisherName, java.lang.String citeKey)
      appends suffix of Book Bibliographic Item to the common BibTeX prefix, and sets the value of Book BibItem's BibTex Format to the same.
      Parameters:
      publisherName - contains name of publisher of the book.
      citeKey - contains citation key of the book.

    • constructBibTexFormat

      public void constructBibTexFormat​(java.lang.String journalName, java.lang.String DOILink, java.lang.String citeKey)
      appends suffix of Article Bibliographic Item to the common BibTeX prefix, and sets the value of Article BibItem's BibTex Format to the same.
      Parameters:
      journalName - contains name of the journal where article was published.
      DOILink - contains DOI Link of the article.
      citeKey - contains citation key of the article.

    • constructBibTexFormat

      public void constructBibTexFormat​(java.lang.String institutionName, int datePublished, java.lang.String citeKey)
      appends suffix of Technical Report Bibliographic Item to the common BibTeX prefix, and sets the value of Technical Report BibItem's BibTex Format to the same.
      Parameters:
      institutionName - contains name of institution where technical report was created.
      datePublished - contains date of submission of technical report.
      citeKey - contains citation key of the technical report.

    • getHarvardFormat

      public java.lang.String getHarvardFormat()
      Returns:
      String returns the private attribute HarvardFormat, containing Bibliography in Harvard - Style.

    • getBibTexFormat

      public java.lang.String getBibTexFormat()
      Returns:
      String returns the private attribute BibTexFormat, containing Bibliography in BibTex - Style.

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo​(BibItem bibItemObject)
      Overrides default compareTo method, such that BibItems are sorted based on their year of publication.
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<BibItem>
      Parameters:
      bibItemObject - contains BibItem to which current BibItem will be compared with.
      Returns:
      int returns 1 if current BibItem's year of publication is greater than passed BibItem's year of publication, returns -1 otherwise.
